item.title: Increase your productivity by installing a treadmill at your desk
item.description:
A recent study featured in the journal Plos One found that using a treadmill desk could lead to higher productivity compared to a traditional desk setup. [Image of a treadmill desk] Source: Plos One This study, titled “Treadmill Workstations: The Effects of Walking while Working on Physical Activity and Work Performance”, was conducted by researchers from the University of Minnesota-Twin Cities, University of Texas-Arlington, Mayo Clinic, and Arizona State University. Over 12 months, they observed the impact of treadmill desks on physical activity and work output at a financial services company...

item.title: Kickstarter's main focus is the standing desk
item.description:
If you need a desk that allows you to work comfortably while standing, Steven Yu might have a solution. His StandDesk is height-adjustable, ranging from 71cm to 114cm, and incorporates design elements that make frequent adjustments easy. Source: Kickstarter. The all-black StandDesk version. “The StandDesk is more than a product; it’s a positive step towards improving people’s lives globally,” Yu stated on his Kickstarter page. An intuitive ‘up/down’ control button effortlessly raises or lowers the desk to the desired height...
